name: Vitau
headline: Subscription pharmacy for patients with chronic diseases in LatAm.
description: Subscription model pharmacy for patients with chronic diseases in Latin America. We delivery medicine every month and help with the insurance reimbursement. We're currently operating in Mexico.

founders.name: Tuto Assad, Founder
founders.description: I was diagnosed with diabetes when I was 13 and have been helping diabetics ever since. I believe everyone has the right to be healthy and enjoy life; innovation and entrepreneurship play a big role to make this happen. My mission is to empower entrepreneurs to do great things that do good; and find the cure for diabetes.

founders.name: Alejandro Lozano Zárate, Founder
founders.description: I'm a young entrepreneur, leader, and engineer, building startups since I was 15 years old. I'm passionate about software development, product management and digital marketing. I'm convinced that thru innovation we can make the world a better place. I want to make a difference in Mexico and Latin America!

generated_description:
**Vitau: Redefining Pharmacy through Subscription in Latin America**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S19, Vitau is blazing a trail in the digital healthcare landscape of Latin America, specifically in Mexico, where its headquarters is located in Monterrey. With a mission to serve patients with chronic diseases, Vitau operates on a subscription model that simplifies the acquisition of medication and aids in insurance reimbursement.

Here's what you need to know about Vitau:

- **Business Model**: Vitau provides a subscription-based pharmacy service, ensuring that patients receive their necessary medications every month. This model not only alleviates the hassle of traditional pharmacy visits but also addresses a critical need for chronic disease management.

- **Range of Products**: Their offerings span a wide range, including medications (antibiotics, allergy treatments, diabetes supplies, and more), health devices, beauty and hygiene products, and supplements. They emphasize convenience, providing delivery across all of Mexico.

- **Customer Focus**: The company is committed to patient care by providing tools and resources for better health management, and they regularly run promotions to make medications more affordable.

- **Team and Innovations**: With a team of 55 employees, Vitau is embracing technology to enhance the user experience. Their website allows for tracking orders, setting up reminders for medication refills, and offers a user-friendly app available on both iOS and Android.

- **Community Engagement**: Vitau actively engages in health awareness campaigns, such as the National Diabetes Awareness Month, emphasizing their commitment to not just sell medications but also provide health education.

- **Contact and Accessibility**: You can reach them through their website at [vitau.mx](https://vitau.mx), where they offer extensive resources and support through various communication channels, including WhatsApp.

In summary, Vitau positions itself as more than just a pharmacy—it’s a partner in health for chronic patients in Latin America, simplifying access to medications while enriching the user experience through thoughtful engagement and technology. If you’re in Mexico and need a reliable source for your pharmaceuticals, Vitau makes for an appealing option.
